name: themecolor
label: Theme Colors
description: The color palette used for the theme.
input_value: [('gold-grey-purple','Gold, grey, and purple'),('maroon-blue-grey','Blue, maroon, and grey')]

name: logo
label: Logo
description: The logo image used for the theme. Supports .jpg, .jpeg, and .png files.

name: space_1
label: Space 1
description: This setting controls the first space on the homepage to the right of the rotator. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.

name: sidebar
label: Sidebar
description: This setting controls the sidebar. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.

name: space_2
label: Space 2
description: This setting controls the first space on the homepage below the rotator. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.
input_value: [('default_about_info_image.html','Default Content'),('rss_feed_list.html','RSS Feed list'),('news_list.html','News list'),('news_articles_featured.html','Latest News and Article')] #<box_list>

name: space_3
label: Space 3
description: This setting controls the second space on the homepage below the rotator. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.

name: space_4
label: Space 4
description: This setting controls the third space on the homepage below the rotator. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.
